Started slow got more interesting as it went and it ended like absolute crap , it ruined the whole experience for me. 4/10 , the ending detracted 3 points.

This anime consists of romance and betrayal. These elements are used in various ways that intrigue the audience. The animation is very peak for a 2014 anime. Plot is a little cliche and predictable. Soundtrack is really appealing, aswell as the OPs and EDs.
Other than that really good anime. Anime ended kind of early and wished we saw Yona take her kingdom back. Not a masterpiece as the comments say, but it was enjoyable.
Overall Score: 8.2/10

i thik su-won killed the king becasue he realized how much other cities were struggling. I think he wants to help that poor village and others like it. I really dont think su-won is a bad guy

In my opinion he killed the king is out of rage cause if he really want to become the king he can just marry the daughter and not cause such an uproar. And i agree with you, he might not be the bad guy but theoretically he is the bad guy. Since Yona saw her dad got killed by him, he definitely will continue to put on the "bad guy mask". If they going to kill him it would probably happen somewhere at the end of the anime/manga when he fixes everything.
The second opinion is that the previous king might have information that might endanger him that's why he had to silence the previous king and maybe he might be working with those that had killed yona mom, if not it is strange that those group of people would stay silence after knowing that people are blaming them for something they did not do.
In conclusion, if its the first option then he might be playing with a double-edged sword, if not then he is probably safe, at least that is what i think.

Good news everyone: season 2 will be released next year. The director of the manga series Mizuho Kusanagi had been very severely affected during the Kumamoto Earthquakes, thats why she never got to finish the manga. She released a new chapter in April (2021) so we will wait for the animated version..

Don't get people hopes high...it is not impossible but the possibility is very very very low. To be able to animate a manga/LN out, you need money first. This anime or i would say the manga is underrated and that is probably cause of websites like this. Where anyone could watch anything for free. Without money, they can't animate the second season out. Another thing is that the author might just want to promote his/her manga that's why they only have 1 season. It doesn't means that a new chapter comes out = new season coming, solo leveling have so many chapters but it isn't getting animated anytime soon either.
Good point actually.
